name: The Lost Village
description:
The Lost Village is a unique 3D SIM game. You will perform as the son of the former Master, build a village on a beautiful but empty mountain, travel the journey to be the top faction in this world. Lead your followers and pupils, collect resources, build facilities, gradually develop and grow. Recruit more people, exercise their abilities, then enter the ancestral memory illusion. Fight against unusual enemies, acquire treasures and knowledge. You will learn the hard work of being a Master, in the meanwhile, feel the proudness of seeing your village prospers again from zero!


Build your village as you will
You will assign different tasks for your followers of various personalities and talents. Let them collect resources, build, work, relax – and exercise! Manage them properly, do not forget to let them take a break, even enjoy a tea time or play a Go game. Try to arrange your buildings nicely, make your village beautiful the way you like.


Design a battle route
The performance of battles in The Lost Village differs from others. The illusional domain is a time and space with great danger as well as opportunities. The enemies do not intend to let you pass easily. You will be using your “Spiritual Tiles” to settle a route in the air, for your pupils to walk on and get to the end, sometimes travel more in the domain for more loot. Although you will not control the combat moves, you need to choose and change the fighters’ equipment and martial arts all the time, in order to deal with various challenges. After your followers grow stronger, perhaps you can send them down the mountain to join in many real events, such as a fight tournament.


Stories behind the curtain
Why did a once prosperous village disappear? What have your ancestors gone through when they first built the village? As the game proceeds, you will unlock many unknown secretes, and add then into your own storybook.

Immersive experience
  • The game is full 3D scene. Characters and buildings are vividly expressed.
  • An art style of oriental charm. Feel the beauty of the village beside an ancient tree, a crystal-clear pond, or inside a tea shed.
  • Music and scripts of unique art style. Perform your job as a Master in a peaceful mood.
  • More abundant contents will meet you soon. Keep your appetite!
